snippet: The company, Center for Health Transformation, apparently faltered after Mr. Gingrich severed ties with it when he entered the presidential race.
abstract: Center for Health Transformation, a consulting company founded by Newt Gingrich, files for bankruptcy, an apparent casualty of his stepping down from the business to run for the Republican presidential nomination; company charged up to $200,000 annually to big drug makers, insurance companies and hospitals for Gingrich’s advice.
lead_paragraph: The company, Center for Health Transformation, apparently faltered after Mr. Gingrich severed ties with it when he entered the presidential race.

headline.seo: Former Gingrich Consultancy Files for Bankruptcy
headline.main: A Company Gingrich Founded to Offer Health Care Advice Files for Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: A Company Gingrich Founded to Offer Health Care Advice Files for Bankruptcy
